text: Motion
Motion

Hey, Producer!
I wanna go overseas so bad~!

Oh, overseas?
That sounds great, a trip abroad...

No, not like that~!
I mean, debut as an idol overseas~!

Oh, I see... becoming an idol overseas, huh?
That's ambitious...

If we're talking about idols,
there's no one better than us!

We gotta burst out of Japan and
make a name for ourselves worldwide!

...Yeah,
your enthusiasm is really like you Kogane...
But... going abroad all of a sudden, huh...
We know that much, too~!

But if you don't have big goals,
nothing will come true!

Don't you believe in me,
Producer~...?

Kogane... Sorry,
I got a little doubtful there.

You understand, right~...?
Hehe, as expected of the Producer!

Yeah!
So, let's start by giving it our all from the nearby places.

With your talent, Kogane, you can become an idol who
shines worldwide. I'll support you with all my might.

Yeah~!
Leave it all to me~!

Hehe~ First,
let's put all our effort into the training camp, shall we~
(...The world, huh)
